```{r nfl, echo = FALSE}
library(leaflet)

setwd("~/CourseraDataScienceSpecialty/9_Developing Data Products/Week 2 Assignment")

nfl <- read.csv("nfl stadiums.csv")

nfl %>% 
        leaflet() %>% 
        addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) %>% 
        addCircleMarkers(radius = 8, weight = 1, color = c("Red", "Blue"), label = as.character(nfl$ï..Team)) %>% 
        addLegend(title = "NFL Stadium Locations by Conference", labels = levels(nfl$Conference), 
                  colors = c("Red", "Blue")) %>% 
        addLabelOnlyMarkers(label = Sys.Date())
```
